clean-debug.midnightconfig.title: Clean F3 Configuration
clean-debug.midnightconfig.hideTags.tool: Hides the tags of the block you are looking at.
All shows all information about your PC, reduced shows only the memory usage and none hides everything.
clean-debug.midnightconfig.hideDebugHint: Hides the hints for the debug pie & tps graph
clean-debug.midnightconfig.shyFluids.too: Will only show fluid information about a block when the block actually contains one.
clean-debug.midnightconfig.hideHelpShort: Hides the shortcut 'Press F3 + Q for help'.
clean-debug.midnightconfig.hideNoiseRout: Hides the very long line displaying information about the noise router.
clean-debug.midnightconfig.onlyShowNeces: Hides a lot of stuff from the left side of the debug screen and only leaves whats necessary to most people.
clean-debug.midnightconfig.hideCoordinat: Prevents coordinates from being visible on the debug screen. Doesn't hide in which direction you are looking.
clean-debug.midnightconfig.hideSodium.to: Hides some of the information Sodium adds to the debug screen.
clean-debug.midnightconfig.hideIris.tool: Hides the information Iris adds to the debug screen.
clean-debug.midnightconfig.hideDynamicFp: DynamicFps adds debug info only while the game is unfocused.
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.clean-deb: Removes useless information from the debug screen.
modmenu.summaryTranslation.clean-debug: Allows you to customize what you see on the F3 screen.
